author: ATLAS Collaboration

short_description.content: The ATLAS Collaboration has released its first open data of heavy-ion collisions for research purposes. This dataset features lead-ion (Pb-Pb) collisions at an energy of 5 TeV per nucleon pair, recorded in 2015 as part of the Large Hadron Colliderâ€™s second operation period (LHC Run 2).

title: ATLAS releases first open data from heavy-ion collisions
